title: 02/23/22 DPS Hour 2 - Rob Parker & Ben Maller Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/23/22 DPS Hour 2 - Rob Parker & Ben Maller Guest Hosting
description:
Rob Parker and Ben Maller, filling in for Dan, hand out their letter grades for LeBron James' 4-year run with the Los Angeles Lakers thus far, tell us if the Cleveland Cavaliers should even want LeBron back in town during the twilight of his NBA career, debate whether or not we should be optimistic that MLB and the Players' Union will be able to strike a deal and avoid missing regular season games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Rob Parker and Ben Maller, filling in for Dan, hand out their letter grades for LeBron James' 4-year run with the Los Angeles Lakers thus far, tell us if the Cleveland Cavaliers should even want LeBron back in town during the twilight of his NBA career, debate whether or not we should be optimistic that MLB and the Players' Union will be able to strike a deal and avoid missing regular season games.
